name: Sword Hunter
description:
The peaceful town has been infiltrated by thugs and rival gangs. Stop them with your blades! As the hunter of the famed dojo, you are the only hero who can resist the endless waves of enemies.

Sharpen your blades, hone your skills and gear as you embark on this perilous mission. Combine ruthless sword power with powerful skills to defeat your foes!

-- FEATURES --
• Earn cool swrods with awesome ultimate powers.
• Collect and combine skills to aid you in battle.
• Equip and upgrade your hero with powerful sets of gear.
• Earn talents to improve your stats and gain unique traits.
• Tons of unique locations and enemies to defeat, test your skills against powerful bosses with unique challenges!
